body.description: ASRock Micro ATX DDR3 1066 Motherboards FM2A68M-DG3+

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 356 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This board worked great! Had an older computer that would not switch on with out unplugging for at least 30 minutes and fiddling around with the power button. Replaced power source with no change. Figured I'd give a new motherboard as the next possible solution. Already had lots of ddr3 ram and a cheapo video card so I wanted a board that supported that. First time replacing a motherboard and it was super easy. Only issue I had was the power switch connections where different. No problem. Just wired up a simple switch to turn it on. Fired it up and it booted up right away! I did not need to reinstall windows. Took about 2 hours to install and boot up then update a bunch of drivers and I was good to go! Only thing I didn't care for was all the software I didn't need that it try's to load when inserting the disc that comes with it. I guess that helps them keep the costs down so not a big deal. Great product at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable, Stable & easy install. Lightning protection worked.
reviews.reviewText: Stable, Easy to install and never had problems.Lightning & Surge Protection truly worked!!I've used this board for 3 years and it was the only computer still working after a lightning strike destroyed most electronics in our home. The Surge and Lightning strike protection features worked.Even though the network port stopped working after the strike, the rest of the computer was not harmed.Will buy other ASRock products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does as expected.
reviews.reviewText: For the price I paid for this board, it is fabulous. It replaces an ATX board. The connector for the case fan is difficult to plug in, but after taking care of that issue, the board has been flawless. I'm pleased that I got to use the CPU, memory, and video card from the older ATX board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2016
reviews.reviewText: It's a nice price point for an mATX board that supports the new Carizzo APUs. I unboxed it and added my CPU and I was up in running in under 5 minutes. The internet BIOS flash worked great for me and I updated from version 2.40 to 2.60 in under 5 minutes. Not sure if the IO shield works right as I've had other IO not work in my case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have had this one for about 3 months now and everything is running perfect, this was the easiest setup I have ever done for a computer, just snapped in the memory, added an SSD and 1 other HD connected everything to the power supply after putting it into place and connected all the mobo wires with the easy to ready photo in the manual and it started right up and has been running great since.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great board but becareful with coolers.
reviews.reviewText: The board is great, flawless operation, however the only issue I ran into was a physical on. The Ram DIMMs are really close to the CPU socket, and as such I couldn't run any ram with heatsinks on them because they didn't fit under the h212 I installed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great micro atx board.
reviews.reviewText: good value for money, with great features, good website support. Can install 2 MVME drives on motherboard. Not an avid gamer so cannot comment on gaming features. have used Crucial and GSkills DDR4 and works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Board adequate as repacement
reviews.reviewText: This board replaced a more capable ASRock that died in my wife's machine. As the other board was no longer available I chose this board as the closest I could find for the money though this board cost more and offered less. My wife chose the number of stars based on performance. At the time I was sweating my diagnosis that it was the board and not the CPU that died. I chose correctly!

Excellent quality.Lots of extra ports and expansion slots as opposed to the original ASUS motherboard.This board is a quantum leap in quality and functionality as opposed to the original board.Very happy so far with it !!!

Viene con el BIOS más reciente (5.20) con lo que se entrada reconoce los procesadores Carrizo (quería esta mobo para un A8-7680), lo único que no me gustó es la posición del puerto para la bocina interna, tengo una GTX 750ti cuyo ventilador aplasta los cables de la bocina, fuera de eso todo funciona bien con esta tarjeta madre.

reviews.reviewTitle: Très bonne carte mère en socket FM2+
reviews.reviewText: Bonjour, je partage avec vous mon expérience pour cette carte mère:De marque: asrockDe modèle: FM2A68M-DG3+Que j'ai du achetez pour reconditionné mon ordinateur qui avait une carte mère msi avec des codes erreur qui s'afficher avant le chargement du windows et après le menu du bios c9 a2 99 9c...Problème réccurant chez msi (bios hs)au début j'ai été septique sur la marque la car je travailler uniquement sur msi et asus jusqu'à maintenant, donc au vu des commentaires je me suis laisser tenté et cela sans regrès, car avec le passage de windows 10 tout les pilotes ce sont installez automatiquement ce qui fait gagner un temps fou, j'ai également constaté une amélioration sur les indice de performance au niveau du processeur que j'avait.couplé avec un sshd firecudda de chez seagate ,et 8 go de ram de chez corsair vengeance l'allumage ce fait en 20 seconde ,pas de surchauffe même en faisant tourner des jeux à fond .elle offre la possibilité d'ajouter plusieurs port sata par rapport au msi qui sont limité pour la même gamme de prix .et le point fort de celle-ci c'est qu'elle soit compatible pci-e 16x 3.0 ce qui offre une meilleur expérience pour vos jeux vidéo que de brancher une carte graphique gtx ddr5 sur un port 2.0 vous aurais des variations légères mais seront présente.Si mon commentaire vous semble utile avant votre achat, merci de cliquer sur utile ci-dessous

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2018
reviews.reviewText: The audio went on my gigabyte board so just wanted something cheap (until I can afford to upgrade my CPU / MB). I am surprised how good this MB is. Love the BIOS, Fan control and X-boost function.I am now an ASRock fan!
